recipe.title: Green Bean Casserole Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 15 oz ; cream of mushroom soup ; (425 g)

steps.step: To an 8-inch (20 cm) microwave-safe pie dish, add the green beans and cream of mushroom soup, then sprinkle the fried onions evenly over the top.
Microwave for 5 minutes at half power until onions have become a little crispy.
Top with scallions and serve warm.
